skill.name: analyzing-financial-statements
skill.description: This skill calculates key financial ratios and metrics from financial statement data for investment analysis
skill.summary: This skill calculates key financial ratios and metrics from financial statement data for investment ...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: All 18 static findings are false positives. The static analyzer misidentified financial terminology and documentation as security threats. This skill performs pure in-memory mathematical calculations with no network access, file I/O, or command execution. Only processes financial data passed as function arguments.

content.value_statement: This skill calculates key financial ratios from balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow data. It provides investment analysis with industry benchmarks and actionable recommendations.
actual_capabilities: Calculate 20+ financial ratios including ROE, ROA, current ratio, debt-to-equity, and P/E
Compare results against industry benchmarks for technology, retail, financial, manufacturing, and healthcare sectors
Generate trend analysis when historical data is provided
Produce formatted reports with interpretations and recommendations
limitations: Requires accurate financial data as input
Industry benchmarks are general guidelines and may not apply to all situations
Does not perform due diligence or validate data authenticity

use_cases.title: Quick Ratio Analysis
use_cases.description: Calculate and benchmark financial ratios for stock screening and investment research

use_cases.title: Financial Health Check
use_cases.description: Assess company liquidity, leverage, and profitability against industry standards

use_cases.title: Performance Reporting
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive financial analysis reports with executive summaries

prompt_templates.title: Basic Ratio Calculation
prompt_templates.prompt: Calculate profitability, liquidity, and leverage ratios from this financial data: [insert revenue, net income, assets, liabilities, etc.]

prompt_templates.title: Industry Comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this company's financial ratios against [technology/retail/financial/manufacturing/healthcare] industry benchmarks

prompt_templates.title: Trend Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Calculate financial ratios for the past 3 years and analyze trends in ROE, current ratio, and debt-to-equity

prompt_templates.title: Investment Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a comprehensive financial analysis including all ratio categories, industry comparison, trend analysis, and investment recommendations

output_examples.input: Calculate key financial ratios with revenue of $1M, net income of $150K, total assets of $2M, current assets of $800K, current liabilities of $400K, and shareholders equity of $1.5M
Analyze this retail company's financial health with industry benchmarks
output: Liquidity: Current ratio of 1.4 is Good for retail industry (benchmark: 1.5)
Leverage: Debt-to-equity of 0.9 is Acceptable for retail (benchmark: 0.8)
Profitability: Gross margin of 32% is Good for retail industry
Overall assessment: Healthy financial position with room for improvement in leverage

best_practices: Provide complete financial data including all balance sheet and income statement line items for accurate calculations
Specify the industry sector when comparing against benchmarks for more relevant analysis
Use historical data across multiple periods to identify meaningful trends
anti_patterns: Using incomplete or estimated data that may produce misleading ratio values
Relying solely on one ratio type without considering the full financial picture
Ignoring industry context when interpreting valuation metrics

faq.question: What financial data does this skill require?
faq.answer: Income statement (revenue, net income, expenses), balance sheet (assets, liabilities, equity), and market data (share price, shares outstanding).

faq.question: What are the limitations on input size?
faq.answer: The skill processes data in-memory. Very large datasets with hundreds of periods may slow down calculations.

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with spreadsheets?
faq.answer: The skill accepts data programmatically. Users can extract data from spreadsheets and pass it as structured input.

faq.question: Is my financial data kept private?
faq.answer: Data is processed locally within the skill and is not transmitted externally or stored permanently.

faq.question: Why do some ratios show N/A?
faq.answer: N/A appears when required input values are missing, zero, or when calculations result in undefined values like division by zero.

faq.question: How does this compare to Excel financial functions?
faq.answer: This skill provides automated ratio calculation with interpretation. Excel offers more flexibility but requires manual setup and formulas.
